trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for resources that can be added to an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 추가할 수 있는 리소스에 대 한 기본 클래스를 정의 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Commits all changes and flushes the resource to the document package.
trans-unit.target: 모든 변경 내용을 커밋하고 문서 패키지에 리소스를 플러시합니다.

trans-unit.source: Based on settings of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, the flush operation of the Commit method may be delayed until the whole <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is closed.
trans-unit.target: 설정에 따라 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>및 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>와 같은 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>및 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, 플러시 작업을 커밋 메서드의 전체 될 때까지 지연 될 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>닫힙니다.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the I/O stream for reading or writing the resource.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 읽기 또는 쓰기는 리소스에 대 한 I/O 스트림을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> for reading or writing the resource.
Returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource that is relative to a specified absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 지정된 절대 기준으로 하는 리소스의 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: The of the resource that is relative to the specified absolute inUri.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] 인프라 하며 사용자 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.
